languages.text: "Раз ты хочешь мне помочь, то может наконец-то продемонстрируешь свои выдающиеся способности, и подсобишь мне в бою?"

traits.locale_text: "Раз ты хочешь мне помочь, то может наконец-то продемонстрируешь свои выдающиеся способности, и подсобишь мне в бою?"

languages.text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"
languages.original_text: "Раз ты хочешь мне помочь, то может наконец-то продемонстрируешь свои выдающиеся способности, и подсобишь мне в бою?"

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"
"If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"
"If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"
"If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

languages.text: “如果你真的打算帮助我，为什么不一起参加战斗，展示一下你无与伦比的战斗技巧？”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的打算帮助我，为什么不一起参加战斗，展示一下你无与伦比的战斗技巧？”

languages.text: «Si quieres ayudarme, ¿por qué no sacas a relucir esas habilidades tuyas tan excepcionales y luchas junto a mí?».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: «Si quieres ayudarme, ¿por qué no sacas a relucir esas habilidades tuyas tan excepcionales y luchas junto a mí?».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}に手を貸したいなら、その類まれな技術を発揮して戦闘で援護してくれれば良いではないか？」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}に手を貸したいなら、その類まれな技術を発揮して戦闘で援護してくれれば良いではないか？」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mir helfen möchtet, warum demonstriert Ihr nicht endlich Eure herausragenden Fähigkeiten und helft mir im Kampf?"
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mir helfen möchtet, warum demonstriert Ihr nicht endlich Eure herausragenden Fähigkeiten und helft mir im Kampf?"

languages.text: « Si vous souhaitez m'aider, pourquoi ne pas me montrer enfin toute l'étendue de vos talents en combattant avec moi ? »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous souhaitez m'aider, pourquoi ne pas me montrer enfin toute l'étendue de vos talents en combattant avec moi ? »

languages.text: "Bana yardım etmek istiyorsan neden şu eşi benzeri olmayan yeteneklerini sergileyip savaşta destek olmuyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "If you wish to help me, why don't you finally demonstrate these exceptional skills of yours and aid me in battle?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana yardım etmeyi istiyorsan neden şu eşi benzeri olmayan yeteneklerini sergileyip bana savaşta yardım etmiyorsun?"
